name: The Right Is The Wrong!
description:
The Witch need you to find the ingredients for her potion.

The Witch longs for eternal peace.

The Witch is not a force to be reckoned with.

Just remember one thing... The witch is evil. Give The Witch what she wants, and the world winces in pain.

Prepare to embark on a perilous journey to bring a witch her items. Fail the witch's riddles to stop her from getting the ingredients. Realise the difference between good and evil, truth and false, right and wrong.
